content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1694637626078{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(https://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/AdobeStock_195430071-scaled.jpeg?id=6967) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Payroll Outsourcing Services

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548113152764{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Take the burden of payroll off your shoulders

Managing payroll is a tedious process. With every new hire, your task list—from collecting documents and timesheets to distributing paychecks and tax forms—eats up more of your day. But when you’re hiring temporary workers to boost your productivity, you don’t want the headache of payroll to increase.

 

ATR International covers all your contractor payroll needs, so you can focus on hitting one business goal after another.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1549633236844{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Efficient Payrolling, From Start to Finish

 

Fill in gaps in your organization without adding to your headcount. We’ll add your contractor to our payroll and act as their employer of record. All your payroll priorities are covered for the entire duration of their assignment:

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

  • Candidate background and drug screening
  • Employee onboarding and offboarding
  • I-9 compliance (including E-Verify)
  • TN and other foreign worker visa administration
  • Employee benefits
  • Employee direct deposit
  • Year-end W-2 forms
  • Expense reimbursement
  • Weekly payroll processing
  • Daily administrative support

 

Our team also mitigates co-employment concerns with our comprehensive contractor care program.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”6956″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1549633236844{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Payrolled Candidates for any Industry

Want to alleviate the stress of hiring, too? Pair our payroll outsourcing and staffing services to fill your workforce gaps with a hands-free hiring process. With 35 years of staffing experience, we leverage our deep connections with diverse contractors to match businesses—from mid-size to Fortune 100-500 organizations—with professionals in:

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6959″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Administrative Services

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6960″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Engineering

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6961″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Finance & HR

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6962″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

IT

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6963″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Manufacturing

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6964″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Operations

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6965″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Management & Leadership

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6966″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Sales & Marketing

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

 

Learn how you can get a payrolled ATR contractor on assignment at your organization!

 

Reach out today

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1548209362006{background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/bigstock-Multiethnic-Diverse-Group-Of-C-255450298.jpg?id=1424) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay blue-gradient-overlay padding-bottom-70″][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”]

Don't just take our word for it

  • ATR understands the high standards we require and their thorough screening process, large network, and experienced recruiters are able to consistently find the people we need.

     

    -ATR Client

  • When I need staffing services, I call ATR. They never fail to deliver results. They are reliable, professional, ethical, and know their business well.

     

    – ATR Client

  • We have found ATR to be a great business partner. They are professional, knowledgeable, honest, and hardworking. They demonstrate their commitment to quality and great client service every day in large and small ways. 

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

    Organizations We’re A Part Of

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1501″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1513″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1510″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1500″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Latest news and activity

    How Can AI Drive Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in the Recruitment Process?

    02.29.2024 | Artificial Intelligence, Diversity

    Can AI-powered recruiting tools transform your workforce? While only 25% of organizations use artificial intelligence for HR-related activities, mainly to save time and money, this revolutionary technology can serve an even greater purpose—beyond generating job descriptions and streamlining workflows.  AI has the power to diversify your candidate base and drive unbiased decision-making throughout the hiring […]

    Read the Article

    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
